column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Catherine - Thank you for your review and feedback. We have not changed our noodles or our broth recipes at any of our locations whatsoever. In fact
column2: we purchase our noodles and ship them 3x per week from our corporate headquarters to ensure consistent quality. And we have specific chefs who spend 10-12 hours per day creating our signature broths from scratch.
